mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_user ( user_id, email, user_pw, user_name, nickname, profile_image, login_type, provider_id, user_role, user_status, group_id, birth_date, gender, phone, email_verified, background_theme, login_fail_count, reg_date, upd_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{email}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{loginType}, #{providerId}, #{userRole}, #{userStatus}, #{groupId}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{emailVerified}, #{backgroundTheme}, #{loginFailCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, user_pw, user_name, nickname, profile_image, login_type, provider_id, user_role, user_status, group_id, birth_date, gender, phone, email_verified, background_theme, last_login_date, login_fail_count, reg_date, upd_date FROM pj_user WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT user_id, email, user_pw, user_name, nickname, profile_image, login_type, provider_id, user_role, user_status, group_id, birth_date, gender, phone, email_verified, background_theme, last_login_date, login_fail_count, reg_date, upd_date FROM pj_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE pj_user SET last_login_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE pj_user SET login_fail_count = login_fail_count + 1, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE pj_user SET login_fail_count = 0, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE pj_user SET user_pw = #{userPw}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE pj_user SET user_status = #{userStatus}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE pj_user SET profile_image = #{profileImage}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}

UPDATE pj_user SET nickname = #{nickname}, group_id = #{groupId}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, background_theme = #{backgroundTheme}, upd_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
